title: Privacy
description: This site is static and does not store form submissions.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Privacy

Privacy

This site is static and does not store form submissions.

We do not collect personal information through on-site forms. Contact links open your email client; messages are handled in email.

Basic server logs may be collected by hosting providers for security and performance.

Why this matters: clarifying expectations early reduces misunderstandings, delays, and unnecessary costs later.
